item.title: How to Customize a Very Long Drop Down Menu in Divi
item.description: How to customize the drop down menu in your Divi theme? This is a common question when you have a menu item with many submenu items. You usually come to a point when the content can go below the fold of the screen. In these cases, you will not be able to see the remaining submenu items. Luckily to all of us who are using the Divi theme, there is a nice hidden feature, called “mega menu”.
